## Summary

For North South University students, Advising is painfully unpleasent process. Login to the RDS and Searching for same courses, refreshing time to time to see update is very monotonous.
Our project is to make advising easier with the help of web automation, OCR and  other technologies.

## Deployment

`git clone` or Download the zip file.

Then check if `pnpm` is installed by running

```shell
pnpm -v
# should show pnpm version 
# if not, run 
npm install pnpm
```

After that, install the node package with

```shell
pnpm i
```

After node module are downloaded, build and start the project with

```shell
pnpm build
pnpm start
```

Then navigate to this [URL](`http://localhost:3000/`) and enjoy.
